title: Covid vaccine question?
author: Dr Douglas Raymond Hilbert Internist San Antonio; TX
description: I took the first dose of Moderna covid vaccine in March but never took the second dose. Learn more from our experts.
cleaned_text: old Complaint duration: 1 Medications: Na Conditions: Na 5 Answers [Dr. Douglas Raymond Hilbert](/Expert/85768-Douglas-Raymond-Hilbert)Internist San Antonio, [Dr. Christopher T. Litchfield](/Expert/902408-Christopher-T-Litchfield)Emergency Physician Dallas, TX [Carl Lauter](/Expert/955262-Carl-Lauter)Infectious MACP, FAAAAI, FIDSA [Dr. Michael Ein](/Expert/457918-Michael-Ein)Infectious Disease Specialist Concord, CA [Dr. Elliot Francke](/Expert/8129246-Elliot-Francke)Infectious Disease Specialist Minneapolis, Minnesota You can take any of the vaccines, but you will need two doses of the Johnson and Johnson vaccine, and likely two more doses of the others.
